nodes.title: Content Collaboration Platform
nodes.summary: An open source file sync and share software for everyone

product.summary: An open source file sync and share software for everyone
A self-hosted file sync and share server software

overview.overview: Nextcloud is an open source file sync and share software for everyone, provides a safe, secure, and compliant file synchronization and sharing solution on servers that you control.

highlights: Pre-configured, one-click to deploy on Cloud Server
All codes on your server, secure and customizable
Paid image, free professional support for your business

childMarkdownRemark.html: Nextcloud is an open source file sync and share software for everyone. From individuals operating the free Nextcloud in the privacy of their own home, to large enterprises and service providers, Nextcloud provides a safe, secure, and compliant file synchronization and sharing solution on servers that you control.
